prepaySpread.description: Required only when posting a position & Required only when Prepay Index is other than 'NA' and 'Fixed Rate'

price.description: Required only when posting a position

quantity.description: Required only when posting a position, returning and increasing qty on Pay To Hold

rate.description: Required only when posting a position, adjusting rate & Required only when Index is 'NA' or 'Fixed Rate'

securityDetail.description: Required only when posting a position

settleDate.description: Required only when posting a position, updating Pay To Hold qty

spread.description: Required only when posting a position, adjusting rate & Required only when Index is other than 'NA' and 'Fixed Rate'

tradeDate.description: Required only when posting a position, updating Pay To Hold qty

tradingDesk.description: Required only when posting a position & Either tradingDeskId or tradingDesk or useTraderDesk is required

tradingDeskId.description: Required only when posting a position & Either tradingDeskId or tradingDesk or useTraderDesk is required

tranId.description: Required only when adjusting rate, editing position, updating Pay To Hold qty

useDefaultCollateralAccount.description: Required only when posting a position & Either collateralAccountId or collateralAccountNo or collateralAccountNo2 or collateralAccountName or useDefaultCollateralAccount is required

useDefaultCollateralCustBank.description: Required only when posting a position & Required only when positionType is 'NONCASH LOAN' & Either collateralCustodianBankId or collateralCustodianBankAccountNo or collateralCustodianBankAccountNo2 or collateralCustodianBankAccountName or useDefaultCollateralCustBank is required

useDefaultExposure.description: Required only when posting a position & Either exposureId or useDefaultExposure is required

useTraderDesk.description: Required only when posting a position & Either tradingDeskId or tradingDesk or useTraderDesk is required

action.description: Should be 'Cancel Loan Trade' to Cancel Loan, 'Cancel Pay To Hold Trade' to Cancel Pay To Hold, 'Adjust Rate' to Re-rate on Loan and Pay To Hold, 'Decrease Pay To Hold' to descrease Pay To Hold Qty, 'Increase Pay To Hold' to increase Pay To Hold Qty

userId.description: Either userId or userName is required

userName.description: Either userId or userName is required

clientSecId.description: Required only when posting a position & Either securityId or cusip or ticker or quickCode or isin or sedol or clientSecId is required

cusip.description: Required only when posting a position & Either securityId or cusip or ticker or quickCode or isin or sedol or clientSecId is required

isin.description: Required only when posting a position & Either securityId or cusip or ticker or quickCode or isin or sedol or clientSecId is required

quickCode.description: Required only when posting a position & Either securityId or cusip or ticker or quickCode or isin or sedol or clientSecId is required

securityId.description: Required only when posting a position & Either securityId or cusip or ticker or quickCode or isin or sedol or clientSecId is required

sedol.description: Required only when posting a position & Either securityId or cusip or ticker or quickCode or isin or sedol or clientSecId is required

ticker.description: Required only when posting a position & Either securityId or cusip or ticker or quickCode or isin or sedol or clientSecId is required

status.description: Allowed values for position and trade status: OPEN, CLOSED, FUTURE, PREPAID, FAILED, CANCELLED. Allowed values for trade settled status: NEW, READY, PENDING, SETTLED, DELETED, FAILED, NO INSTRUCTION, PRINTED, ACCEPTED, VOID
